A

Account - Class in Unnamed Package
An abstract representation of a bank account, providing core functionalities such as deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and account information retrieval.
Account(int, double) - Constructor for class Account
Constructs a new Account with the specified account number and initial balance.
accountNumber - Variable in class Account
The unique account number associated with this account.
addAccount(Account) - Method in class Customer
Adds an account to the customer's list of accounts.
addInterest() - Method in class Saving
Adds interest to the current balance of the savings account.
address - Variable in class Person
The address of the person.

B

balance - Variable in class Account
The current balance of the account.
birthDate - Variable in class Person
The birth date of the person in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

C

Checking - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a Checking account, which is a type of Account.
Checking(int, double) - Constructor for class Checking
Constructs a new Checking account with the specified account number and balance.
Credit - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a credit account, a type of bank account that allows withdrawals and payments up to a specified credit limit.
Credit(int, double, double) - Constructor for class Credit
Constructs a new Credit account with the specified account number, credit limit, and initial balance.
Customer - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a customer, inheriting from the Person class.
Customer(int, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Customer
Constructs a new Customer with the specified ID and personal details.

T

transactionLogger - Class in Unnamed Package
The transactionLogger class is responsible for logging transaction messages to a log file.

W
